QuestData.Title: Saurolisk Escape
QuestData.Description: You cautiously approach a saurolisk tied to a post. It doesn't snap at you, but looks at you with defeat in its eyes.$b$bThe troggs seem to be keeping these saurolisks against their will. They should be freed before they are abused further.
QuestData.RewardText: Troggs training saurolisks to be ridden? Seems they've learned from watching us after all.$b$bIt's better that you freed them. I don't particularly want to imagine what would happen if the troggs were widely successful in their new riding endeavors!
